bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation of a National FIRST Robotics Day and its celebration around the United States.
The resolution also encourages states and local educational agencies to fund after-school robotics programs.
Finally, the resolution encourages schools and educators to observe the day with activities that teach students about robotics and engage them with the study of mathematics and science.
